name: 8th Annual International Conference on Qualitative and Quantitative Economics Research â€“ QQE 2018
content: he growth momentum of the global economy seems to be satisfactory, though there is a change in its direction. US economy has not grown at the desired rate over last couple of years, whereas, European and Asian countries had GDP growth more than projected, along with rise in global manufacturing and trade. Emerging markets' financial conditions have supported growth, though there has been tightening of US policy. Several emerging and advanced economies are still operating below capacity
